Html:
Hi,

I am trying to build a web page parser, and need to retreive CSS styles applied to each HTML element.

I am able to get CSS style applied at element level, but not able to retreieve CSS styles coming through include file or via inheritance.

Is there a way to get that information programatically?

Any pointers will be helpful.

thanks
HAP doesn't provide CSS information past the "class" attribute. For this you will probably be best served using the IE or Gecko# controls and query their DOM implementations.
